snippet: Activists pledged to file a criminal complaint against Jean-Marie Le Pen of the National Front after he used an apparently anti-Semitic pun about ovens to dismiss critics.
abstract: Activists vow to file criminal complaint against Jean-Marie Le Pen, founder of French far-right National Front, after he uses apparently anti-Semitic pun about ovens to dismiss one of his Jewish critics.

byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Activists pledged to file a criminal complaint against Jean-Marie Le Pen of the National Front after he used an apparently anti-Semitic pun about ovens to dismiss critics.

headline.seo: Jean-Marie LePen Draws Fire for Apparent Anti-Semitic Pun
headline.main: A Remark in France Is Assailed as Racist
headline.print_headline: A Remark in France Is Assailed as Racist
